paragraph1: I'm a freelancer based in France who has been constantly learning and practicing web development for more than 4 years. My goal is to become a full-stack engineer.
paragraph2: Web development and web design have become new passions. I just like to design and create things with Figma or Framer and integrate them into websites mainly with Reactjs or Nextjs as frameworks using Typescript.
paragraph3: Apart from that, I love playing video games to detach myself a bit from the routine and relax as well as go to the gym üí™üî±. I also love to listen to music. I listen to music everyday while playing videogames, in the gym, while coding or even while sleeping. Last, but not least, I love cats üê± !
quote: 'If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.' - Bruce Lee
payzura: First team project : A web3 Paypal like - an open-source decentralized escrow smart contract system - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
kiabi: Integration and development of the interface for the new tablet directly installed in Kiabi stores - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
felix: Integration and development of the international platform: Felix - using Next.js and TailwindCSS
jobzura: Second team project : A web3 native jobs marketplace Fiverr-like - Made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
cyc: First client project : A crypto website made with Next.js and Tailwindcss.
skoonova: Third client project : An E-sport coaching platform made with Next.js, Tailwindcss/Chakraui, Stripe and Firebase.
aesfa: Second client project : A website for an association made with Next.js, Tailwindcss and MongoDB.
twitterclone: First project to learn how to recreate Twitter's homepage with Next.js and Firebase
linkedinclone: Second project to learn how to recreate Linkedin's homepage with Next.js and MongoDB.
promptify: Promptify is an open-source AI prompting tool for modern world to discover, create and share creative prompts.
messengerclone: A messenger clone built with the latest Next.js 13.4 version, Prisma, MongoDB and Pusher for live messages.
ecommerceclone: A project to learn how to recreate an ecommerce store which implements Stripe as a payment functionality.
todolist: First React Native project to learn how to recreate a simple todo list
teslaclone: Second React Native project to learn how to recreate a basic homepage of a Tesla app
nftapp: Third React Native project to learn how to recreate a NFT app with a modern design
